body:
A few weeks ago, I filled out a form for the staff to give recognition to community members or other staff that they look up to or appreciate. I have now made this public in spirit of Christmas holidays, and if your name wasn't mentioned, we still admire you for staying with us. We value everyone in different ways, and this was opened as an extended opportunity to those people. Without further ado, here are the results;

ViceWatercolour -> Acceqted: Acceqted, you've been a pretty chill dude. I've liked scrimming with you, and I like talking to you on TeamSpeak/Skype whenever I get the chance. You've been promising thus far as a friend, and I very much do enjoy the casual chats we have here and there. You're one I can talk to for things and trust, and I'm more than happy to recognize you. Thank you for being a great friend, and I hope we can do more in the future together, getting to know each other more well. You'd probably be really neat to meet in real life too, if given the chance.

ViceWatercolour -> ThatIsReallyHot: I very much like your initiative and persistence. Out of all the community members I've noticed, I can say with a lot of confidence that your personality developed way more than previously. After constructing a map with you and having a few conversations in TeamSpeak recently, I've decided that I admire you and your contributions. Overall very chill and helpful, showing respect and gradually building maturity, you really stand out!

ViceWatercolour -> Newcleus: He's a blast. Very entertaining conversations in TeamSpeak... however I've noted him to be a leader and very hardworking. He has essentially all the qualities that make a good staff member, and overall, he has a sense of humor. It's fun when you can actually interact with someone and they aren't always a robot.

ViceWatercolour -> Elthandorr: Ever since he was unbanned, he's practically been the most inviting and kind user on the server. Every time I join, I'll get greeted from him. It really helps to have someone say hello and thank you every now and then, especially for such a difficult staff position. The simplest things sometimes mean the most.

ViceWatercolour -> Iron: This dude is one of the all-stars of the staff team. I can say with utmost certainty that he is an outside-the-box thinker, and knows how to work with things he's given. He takes initiative, has been very much more responsible, and over all of the mentoring and moderating tasks he does, he's the absolute most dedicated person. His TeamSpeak activity, fucked up schedule on account of Avicus, and strength for constant mentoring has made it apparent.

ViceWatercolour -> timaeusTestified: I probably wouldn't have made it this far without his wisdom. I want to recognize him for his consistent and loving friendship, where he's always willing to help even when someone else may not be there. From day one as the first map developer to now, he has been one of my best friends. I really love this guy.

ViceWatercolour -> awesome_apricot: Probably not many people remember him anymore, but he was a source of inspiration for me. I liked talking to him whenever I got the chance, and I'll never forget "Scorpion's Nest" and his contributions as staff. Whenever I get a chance, I like to chill with him.

GrapeSmoothie -> DaFrozenBlaze: He posts on the forums a lot o-o

resepignev -> ViceWatercolour: Para is a really funny person, he and Evo got me into building maps for avicus. He never fails to let me smile. I loved the picture war in the #random chat. I bookmarked all his pictures xD
When I hear the KekoCode song on my way to school I always have to laugh because of the video he made :D
Additional he is pretty experienced in music stuff. His mixtape on soundcloud is amazing and he always gives me links to leaks of songs from some famous artists. Oh and I forgot "The World is burning"-song xD

resepignev -> x_Redstone_: He is a redstone god.
Well, you could say he is fluent in command block commands xD
He recently made a adventure map that was amazing.
His maps are also pretty good and now he is in the staff team.
It's always great to talk/chat with him. He has really good ideas. And he loves ocean monuments xD
From what I saw he's a good staff member and I hope he passes his trial. 

resepignev -> Spartemex: My Media-Team buddy <3
We really should post something again, but idk what xD
Spart is a fantastic person. He has a Build server and he's a amazing staff member. There is no particular trait of him that should be recognized. He should be recognized as a great person that he is. He has too many character traits that I could mention. I really like him ;D

resepignev -> Fouled: The flattest of the flats. Sli is a wonderful person. A wonderful mapdev and a wonderful moderator. I love talking to him. I still know when we wanted to make the mapdev website but never came to it. Well, it's a shame but I still want to do it. He is funny as hell xD He likes to play the jimmy neutron theme in meeting and on random occasions. Overall he likes to make other laugh.

resepignev -> timaeusTestified: He and Para got me into building. If I ever had a yml question he could answer it. I love his maps, they are awesome! Also he helped me to release my first Nexus Map (first map that got accepted) Travincal (he thought of the name). He is really funny and smart. Sadly in the last time we didn't chat that much...

resepignev -> fishyfacediamond: Fishy is nize! Really nize! I loved to defend with her in public matches and of course the karaoke party xD Even if I totally sucked in singing it always was fun to do it. I still know when we were defending and constantly decorating the monument. Also killing ourselves with falling anvils xD Sadly she moved away from avicus, but if she is on the TS I always talk to her. 

ProfessorUtonium -> Elthandorr: Elthandorr is always their to help players in-game when no Mods are on. He helps the community on the forums and certainly in-game as a responsible and mature player. I recognize him for his work as a non-staff member that assists players whenever he can.

ProfessorUtonium -> Petlas: Even though she doesn't want to come back as mod, She should still be recognized for what she does and how she acts as a non-staff member on all Avicus Platforms.

Iron -> Buster_U: Being really nice and awesome in-game. She has an incredibly outgoing demeanor and it shows when I see her constantly trying to help people out!

AutoHit -> dilpickel: Is active on the forums and such and is a friendly user on community related sources

Smiley -> X0X0X: They have more activity than I do on Avicus (24 days), they're always a bright and shining example of kindness and they just want to be friends with everyone. Nemo is friends with a lot of people, and I believe a lot would like to see him win this :) He deserves this recognition.

Acceqted -> ViceWatercolour: This user has been a huge role model for a lot of people including me. He helped me throughout many times either in-game or on team speak. He's such an amazing person and the admin position totally suits him. If you need anyone to go to about ANY Topic or problem, Vice would be the exact choice for you. Thank you so much Vice for being a leader and role model throughout the community.

Acceqted -> Midnightstorm: I would like to recognize this player and congratulate them on their promotion on junior mod. I have only known her for a very little amount of time. But she seems super cool and you should get to know her <3. I can't wait to get to know you more. 

x_Redstone_ -> _TinyBear: He is fun to be around and is polite to people around him.

Newcleus -> Iron: Despite the controversy that always manages to circle him, he's still one of the most intelligent people I've met on Avicus. He knows rules inside out and always manages to get the right answer, even though people like to argue it.

Newcleus -> TheTNTPotato: A true example of leadership and knowledge.

Spartemex -> Resepignev: An amazing guy. Helped me through my false demotion, the start of my build server, and a lot of my amazing experiences on this team. He always has a good joke, and a positive atmosphere :)

Spartemex -> timaeusTestified: A dedicated servant to Avicus, and a jack-of-all-trades. I would like to thank him not just for something he has done for me, but what he has done for the server. He is an amazing map developer and moderator, and works hard on the events team as well.

You may use this thread to say your thank-yous to others. Happy holidays.

replies.body_tagged: Editing mine in.

replies.body:
Para - We don't ever really see eye to eye on a lot of things, but I have to admit you're a fantastic admin. I'm certainly not someone you like too much, but I love seeing your disgustingly amusing memes and gifs in #random. I enjoy seeing all your jokes and the amount of fun you have with everyone in the team. Your leadership skills never fail to amaze me and I hope to see you keep the gold tag for some time yet.

Michael - I realize we aren't the best of friends (at all) and it may seem like I hate you and you being a senior, but I will admit you have surprised me since you got your rank. As you've said before, you know your past better than anyone.

Spart and Seth - Hardly talk to you beasts anymore, but y'all are still some of my best friends. I'll try my best to have a chat or with you guys. <3

Sevo - One of my best friends. Don't see you as much as I use to, but you're still a coolio.

Sli - We talk here and there, and I'm not sure if you do, but I consider you a really good friend. I remember the first day I met you in Elimination. Teaming with Peachy, having you kill me and with Peachy just watching. I started yelling at him to kill you, but he never did, haha. You help me with all sorts of things from map making to moderating.

Evo and Skyadia - Wisdomatic hilarious beasts. And Evo made me a great skin I'm looking to keep forever, while Sky was a fantastic friend for a very long time.

AzureKitty and Goldenwalrus - Y'all are cool, wish I'd see you some more. :{ Enjoy talking to you both so much!

Old Build Server Group - Seth, Alex, Slvr, Poker, etc. y'all are fucking beasts. Wish we'd all be on like the old days.

Kylo - Creating a server that I didn't give up on after 2 weeks. <3

replies.body:
alexanderjoe: Thanks for being a great friend and having a public build server!

Arigenn: Thanks for helping me a numerous amount of times with maps.

Cyclops: Thank you for always posting the meme of Michael Jackson eating popcorn when things get heated on the forums :D

DCRaven: Thank you for helping me build my computer and being a great leader of Cacalmarin. You also make me laugh a lot when you complain about stuff xD.

Frowney: Thank you for showing me where to place the wool on Divines: Redux.

KyloCode: Thanks for creating Avicus.

Loo: Thank you for helping me build my computer I use today and for subbing whenever we needed you.

puffycloud5751: Thanks for all our conversations on Skype!

Slvrflash: Thank you for defending with me in public games all the time and being in Predators. Our skype chats were fun as well! I hope I see you around again.

steven5703: Thank you for making me laugh whenever I read your posts on the forums :p

Tynvale: Thank you for making your Top 5 series.

Upsoar: Thanks for being a cool guy to hang out with.

X0X0X: Thanks for making me laugh when I read your posts.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cacalmarin: Thanks for being such a fun clan!

Media: Thank you for streaming our matches.

Staff: Thank you for taking time out of your day to moderate and/or watching matches to ensure they are played fairly. (Includes refs and officials)

Thanks to Jess for always being there for me and making my life more interesting and way better overall. 

Thanks to Elsa for always trying to stand up for what's right and being a great, supportive friend. 

Thanks to Splade for being a really damn good friend as well, always welcome and accepting.

replies.body:
Thanks to:

The community - You've given me a fun server to play on for over 2 years and I'm so grateful. I know I haven't been as responsible or as mature as I could be, but you've put up with my loud-mouthed comments in every game. Thank you!

The staff - You've always tried to help when I've had a question or needed help. You take the time to respond to everyone's reports, and I just want to say thank you for that. I know how taxing that must be, and I want you to know it's appreciated, even if it doesn't seem like it.

Lokigh, Imanmachine, Youlml, Luke836, _Isa, Awesomerp, 4lextr, 7h1r733n, Mathematical, Myv, Dafrozenblaze, Sarna, Feflopizer, Kelr, Frowney and XOXOX - You've always cheered me up on Avicus and have made my time on the server enjoyable. There are others but I haven't got the time or energy to write them all xD. The point is, you've been great. You've been funny, helpful and friendly and that's something I've always been grateful for. Even if you don't feel the same way, I consider you all my friends and that's something I hope you return.

I hope you all have a great Christmas and new year and are ready to play again. <3

P.S: Don't expect this too often. I'm not very sentimental! =P <3

replies.body:
MidnightBeats: We haven't talked much this year but you will always be the person I know most and am friends with for the longest on Avicus, thanks for being there with me this year, let's hope it continues <3

Mihan/Zlik - we've lost contact recently but I know that if we could, we would be talking so much <3 I can literally tell you anything and you can tell me anything, remember the fun times on Nex back in the day <3 if you ever read this I just wanna say thanks for being there and hope we can continue the friendship <3

aFgt/Cheesy - I've only known you this year but it's been the most sensational fun I've had and you've really made this the best year for me on Avicus - all the fun times on CTH have been great and I know that this will continue into 2016 (once you get unbanned xD.) Playing with you has been sick and you always join CTH when I'm on, like your a true friend. Thanks man <3

iMan - I've also only known you this year, but it's been a whizz and we've also had a fair share of fun times on CTH. You're a great guy and you've given me like 10000 credits, how I can repay you I don't even know xD thanks for being there and 2015 has been great with you, the dmc about fit girls even funnier xD <3

also thanks to myworld6, xAntoniaII and Renah_, you 3 have been really cool on CTH and especially Nia for taking my jokes so well because they were out of order xD

Thanks to Patrik for letting me be part of Jalapenos, look forward to a tourney :D

You know who you are, if you've played CTH with me you basically make my Avicus xD <3

replies.body:
"ViceWatercolour -> awesome_apricot: Probably not many people remember him anymore, but he was a source of inspiration for me. I liked talking to him whenever I got the chance, and I'll never forget "Scorpion's Nest" and his contributions as staff. Whenever I get a chance, I like to chill with him."

AWhr makes me feel old lmao

Straight back at you bud bud

replies.body_tagged: <3

reply_to.body:
Thanks to:

The community - You've given me a fun server to play on for over 2 years and I'm so grateful. I know I haven't been as responsible or as mature as I could be, but you've put up with my loud-mouthed comments in every game. Thank you!

The staff - You've always tried to help when I've had a question or needed help. You take the time to respond to everyone's reports, and I just want to say thank you for that. I know how taxing that must be, and I want you to know it's appreciated, even if it doesn't seem like it.

Lokigh, Imanmachine, Youlml, Luke836, _Isa, Awesomerp, 4lextr, 7h1r733n, Mathematical, Myv, Dafrozenblaze, Sarna, Feflopizer, Kelr, Frowney and XOXOX - You've always cheered me up on Avicus and have made my time on the server enjoyable. There are others but I haven't got the time or energy to write them all xD. The point is, you've been great. You've been funny, helpful and friendly and that's something I've always been grateful for. Even if you don't feel the same way, I consider you all my friends and that's something I hope you return.

I hope you all have a great Christmas and new year and are ready to play again. <3

P.S: Don't expect this too often. I'm not very sentimental! =P <3

replies.body: Where am I huh?!??!?!? JK jk ily
replies.body_tagged: Where am I huh?!??!?!? JK jk ily

reply_to.body:
MidnightBeats: We haven't talked much this year but you will always be the person I know most and am friends with for the longest on Avicus, thanks for being there with me this year, let's hope it continues <3

Mihan/Zlik - we've lost contact recently but I know that if we could, we would be talking so much <3 I can literally tell you anything and you can tell me anything, remember the fun times on Nex back in the day <3 if you ever read this I just wanna say thanks for being there and hope we can continue the friendship <3

aFgt/Cheesy - I've only known you this year but it's been the most sensational fun I've had and you've really made this the best year for me on Avicus - all the fun times on CTH have been great and I know that this will continue into 2016 (once you get unbanned xD.) Playing with you has been sick and you always join CTH when I'm on, like your a true friend. Thanks man <3

iMan - I've also only known you this year, but it's been a whizz and we've also had a fair share of fun times on CTH. You're a great guy and you've given me like 10000 credits, how I can repay you I don't even know xD thanks for being there and 2015 has been great with you, the dmc about fit girls even funnier xD <3

also thanks to myworld6, xAntoniaII and Renah_, you 3 have been really cool on CTH and especially Nia for taking my jokes so well because they were out of order xD

Thanks to Patrik for letting me be part of Jalapenos, look forward to a tourney :D

You know who you are, if you've played CTH with me you basically make my Avicus xD <3

replies.body: Massive thanks to Greg for making me laugh my ass off and making my day time and time again.
replies.body_tagged: Massive thanks to Greg for making me laugh my ass off and making my day time and time again.

replies.body:
Michael - The Berzerk team has been throwing shit at you, basically since you became a staff member. But honestly you're not that bad. As Vice said you have a really good sense of humor, and you're fun to be around when you can be interacted with. Not to mention how the server is more stable when you're staff.

Smit - One of the best people i've met lets be honest. Through all this time we've been friends while we lost a lot, stay strong my friend :)

Dynamo - We've been in and out, but nonetheless we're friends at the end. You're also a chill dude and I can't wait to start HCF with you two again <3

Happy Holidays <3

replies.body:
Case: idk we have an 80 day snapstreak but he isn't even a cool dude ;) really though we've been friends for like almost 2 years that's pretty crazy.

Annamarie/Refuse: We have also been friends for a really long time, even though I pissed you off when you were mod hahaha. You're a really cool gal and your dad looks like Tom hanks.

Phyre: I'm not going to lie to you, I thought you were so annoying when I first met you, but after we talked a few times on teamspeak I realized you were just a really nice and outgoing guy. You don't really care what other people think about you and I respect that. You're definitely one of the nicest people I've meat on the Internet and one of my closest friends.

Dynamo: You hated me when you first met me :( haha but I always thought you were a funny guy and really nice to your friends. Even though you got mad at me and max for a while, I always knew you'd come out of it ;)

Heat: We haven't talked in a while and we only talked for probably 2-3 months before I quit, but you're a super chill and nice dude.
